original_text: Surely there is no enchantment against Jacob, neither is there any divination against Israel: according to this time it shall be said of Jacob and of Israel, What hath God wrought!
korean_text: 야곱을 해할 점술이 없고 이스라엘을 해할 복술이 없도다 이 때에 야곱과 이스라엘에 대하여 논할진대 하나님께서 행하신 일이 어찌 그리 크냐 하리로다

sentences.original_text: Surely there is no enchantment against Jacob
neither is there any divination against Israel
according to this time it shall be said of Jacob and of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 때가 되면 야곱과 이스라엘에 대하여 말해질 것이다
